import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Form } from 'react-bootstrap' const pboardInsert = () => { const [form, setForm] = useState({ pprice: 0, ptitle: '', pcontent: '', pimage: '', file: null, fileName: '', uid: '', }) const onChnageForm = (e) => { setForm({ ...form, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const onChangeFile =(e)=>{ setForm({ ...form, file:e.target.files[0] }) } return (
) } export default pboardInsert
